name: HoverBots
description:
Created for Ludum Jam 39! Theme: Running Out Of Power.

Control adorable drones through some very dark rooms to collect treasure and more batteries to stop yourself from RUNNING OUT OF POWER.

Works with Keyboard and should work with any controller, prompts are for Xbox Layout.

Quit & Next Level prompts do NOT need to be cancelled out from. Any other input will cancel them & operate as normal.
